Package helper

Class AppointmentDao

java.lang.Object
helper.AppointmentDao
public class AppointmentDao extends Object
This class will allow us to have a CRUD setup for our appointments table.

  • Method Details

    • getAllAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAllAppointments() throws SQLException, Exception
      This method allows us to get all appointments. A list allAppointments has been created. Iterating through our appointments table we will store each row into an appointmentResult. The result will also be added to our allAppointments list.
      Returns:
      allAppointments Returns all of the appointments from our appointments table
      Throws:
      SQLException
      Exception

    • getCurrentMonth

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getCurrentMonth() throws SQLException, Exception
      This method allows us to get all appointments by the current month. A list allbyMonthAppointments has been created. Iterating through our appointments table by the current month we will store each row into an appointmentResult. The result will also be added to our allAppointments list.
      Returns:
      allbyMonthAppointments Returns all of the appointments by month from our appointments table.
      Throws:
      SQLException
      Exception

    • getCurrentWeek

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getCurrentWeek() throws SQLException, Exception
      This method allows us to get all appointments by the current month. A list allbyWeekAppointments has been created. Iterating through our appointments table by the current year and week which we will store each row into an appointmentResult. The result will also be added to our allbyWeekAppointments list.
      Returns:
      allbyWeekAppointments Returns all of the appointments by week from our appointments table.
      Throws:
      SQLException
      Exception

    • getAppointment

      public static Appointment getAppointment(int Appointment_ID) throws SQLException, Exception
      This method retrieves a single appointment. An Integer value is passed to the Appointment_ID parameter which is then used in the sql query to retrieve the specific row based on the Appointment_ID given. The appointment information is then stored in appointmentResult.
      Parameters:
      Appointment_ID - The Appointment_ID
      Returns:
      appointmentResult returns the appointmentResult
      Throws:
      SQLException
      Exception

    • CreateAppointmentRecord

      public static void CreateAppointmentRecord(javafx.event.ActionEvent event, String Title, String Description, String Location, String Type, LocalDate StartDate, String StartTime, String EndTime, int Customer_ID, int User_ID, int Contact_ID) throws SQLException
      This method creates an appointment record. An insert query is created to insert our parameter values to our appointments table. A format is also used for our timestamps which are : HH:MM:SS
      Parameters:
      Title - For Title
      Description - For Description
      Location - For Location
      Type - For Type
      StartDate - For StartDate
      StartTime - For StartTime
      EndTime - For EndTime
      Customer_ID - For Customer_ID
      Contact_ID - For Contact_ID
      User_ID - For User_ID
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • DeleteAppointment

      public static void DeleteAppointment(javafx.event.ActionEvent event, int Appointment_ID) throws SQLException
      This method processes an appointment deletion. An integer value is passed to Appointment_ID which then is used in our sql query to delete the appointment matching our Appointment_ID
      Parameters:
      Appointment_ID - The Appointment_ID
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • UpdateAppointment

      public static void UpdateAppointment(javafx.event.ActionEvent event, int Appointment_ID, String Title, String Description, String Location, String Type, LocalDate StartDate, String StartTime, String EndTime, int Customer_ID, int User_ID, int Contact_ID) throws SQLException
      This method updates an existing appointment. An update query is used to pass our parameter information to update an existing appointment in our appointments table. A format is also used for our timestamps which are : HH:MM:SS
      Parameters:
      Appointment_ID - For Appointment_ID
      Title - For Title
      Description - For Description
      Location - For Location
      Type - For Type
      StartDate - For StartDate
      StartTime - For StartTime
      EndTime - For EndTime
      Customer_ID - For Customer_ID
      Contact_ID - For Contact_ID
      User_ID - For User_ID
      Throws:
      SQLException
